node.title: Episode 11- Cedarvale Health & Lifestyle Retreat and VitaSalus
node.description:
This episode features two OCI ministries. The first is Cedarvale Health & Lifestyle Retreat in Australia. Located two hours south of Sydney, people find hope and healing in this secluded rainforest setting.

 

The second ministry is VitaSalus, a growing health ministry operating a medical outpatient clinic in Lisbon, Portugal, and developing property to accommodate the lifestyle center and a school of health promotion. The ministry has also pioneered the work of health expos in Portugal and Western Europe.
